name: iCalendar
natural_language_description: 这是 iCalendar 节点。主要用于: Create iCalendar file

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: createEventFile

start.name: start
start.description: Date and time at which the event begins. (For all-day events, the time will be ignored.).
start.natural_language_description: 参数名: Start | 作用: Date and time at which the event begins. (For all-day events, the time will be ignored.). | (必填项)

end.name: end
end.description: Date and time at which the event ends. (For all-day events, the time will be ignored.).
end.natural_language_description: 参数名: End | 作用: Date and time at which the event ends. (For all-day events, the time will be ignored.). | 提示: If not set, will be equal to the start date | (必填项)

allDay.name: allDay
allDay.description: Whether the event lasts all day or not
allDay.natural_language_description: 参数名: All Day | 作用: Whether the event lasts all day or not | 默认值: False

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.description: The field that your iCalendar file will be available under in the output
binaryPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Put Output File in Field | 作用: The field that your iCalendar file will be available under in the output | 提示: The name of the output binary field to put the file in | 默认值: data | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: busyStatus (值: None) - Used to specify busy status for Microsoft applications, like Outlook
calName (值: None) - Specifies the calendar (not event) name. Used by Apple iCal and Microsoft Outlook. More info.
fileName (值: None) - The name of the file to be generated. Default name is event.ics.
recurrenceRule (值: None) - A rule to define the repeat pattern of the event (RRULE). (Rule generator).
sequence (值: None) - When sending an update for an event (with the same uid), defines the revision sequence number
uid (值: None) - Universally unique ID for the event (will be auto-generated if not specified here). Should be globally unique.
url (值: None) - URL associated with event
useWorkflowTimezone (值: None) - Whether to use the workflow timezone set in node's settings rather than UTC
